CustomField.description: The last four digits of the social security number or Tax Id. Required to facilitate Global Search on the last four digits of SSN; simply searching on the last four digits of the standard field do not work- not even when using a wildcard (Salesforce limitation)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The last four digits of the Social Security Number or Tax Id.
CustomField.label: SSN (Last 4 Digits)
